query:
UPDATE
                contracts
            SET
                status = 'RequestExpired', updated_at = $1
            WHERE
                status = 'Requested' AND
                created_at <= $2 AND
                EXISTS (
                  SELECT 1
                  FROM kyc
                  WHERE
                    kyc.lender_id = contracts.lender_id AND
                    kyc.borrower_id = contracts.borrower_id AND
                    kyc.is_done = false
                )
            RETURNING id;
